metadata.synopsis: During the assault on Moonrise. If the player "fixed" the dock jumpers mind, his combat AD will be a bit garbled.
metadata.how_to_trigger: oe mooassaultgo to Moonrise docksstart combat with dock guards

0.speaker: Acolyte Marls
0.text: Can't believe you'd betray the Absolute. Idiot.

1.speaker: Acolyte Marls
1.text: Believe - can't. Idiot! The Absolute... be-tray.
